meanings.prefixVisual: <path d='M4 12 H 16' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2' marker-end='url(#arrow)' /><circle cx='12' cy='12' r='2' fill='currentColor' />

prefixIntro.title: 前缀 pro-
prefixIntro.description:
核心意境是 **“向前” (Forward)**。
表示向前方推进、展示或倾向。
prefixIntro.imagery: 联想一个向前的箭头➡️，或者一个人身体前倾。

words.rootVisual: <rect x='4' y='4' width='16' height='16' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><line x1='6' y1='8' x2='18' y2='8' stroke='currentColor'/><line x1='6' y1='12' x2='18' y2='12' stroke='currentColor'/><line x1='6' y1='16' x2='14' y2='16' stroke='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 一页写满文字的纸，代表散文。

sentences.en: I've always preferred reading prose to poetry.
sentences.cn: 与诗歌相比，我一直更喜欢读散文。

words.rootVisual: <circle cx='10' cy='10' r='6' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-width='2'/><line x1='14' y1='14' x2='20' y2='20' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M10 12v4' stroke='currentColor'/><circle cx='10' cy='14' r='1' fill='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 一个放大镜正在探查细节。

sentences.en: I don't want to probe into your personal affairs.

words.rootVisual: <circle cx='18' cy='6' r='3' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><path d='M16 8l-6 6-4 4' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M10 14l-4 4' stroke='currentColor'/><path d='M2 20h20' stroke='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 一个人身体向前倾斜甚至趴下的姿势。

sentences.en: Kids are all prone to eat junk food.
sentences.cn: 孩子们都倾向于吃垃圾食品。

words.rootVisual: <path d='M12 20l-4-16h8z' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M8 20h8' stroke='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 一个三角形的支架或支撑物。

sentences.en: She propped herself up on one elbow.
sentences.cn: 她用一只胳膊肘把自己撑起来。

words.rootVisual: <path d='M4 12 l8 -6 l8 6 l-8 6 z' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><path d='M4 12 h-2 M20 12 h2 M12 6 v-2 M12 18 v2' stroke='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 一个向四周扩散信号的广播塔，或者植物播种。

sentences.en: A group launched a website to propagate its ideas.
sentences.cn: 一个团体建立了一个网站来宣传它的思想。

sentences.en: Plants won't propagate in these conditions.
sentences.cn: 植物在这些条件下无法繁殖。

words.rootVisual: <rect x='4' y='4' width='16' height='16' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><line x1='8' y1='8' x2='16' y2='8' stroke='currentColor'/><line x1='8' y1='12' x2='12' y2='12' stroke='currentColor'/><path d='M14 16l4 4' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2'/>
words.imagery: 一份正式的卷轴或签署的文件。

sentences.en: The protocols became briefer and more efficient.
sentences.cn: 协议变得更简洁、更高效。

words.rootVisual: <path d='M2 14l4-4 8 0 4 4' stroke='currentColor' fill='none'/><circle cx='6' cy='14' r='2' stroke='currentColor'/><circle cx='18' cy='14' r='2' stroke='currentColor'/>

sentences.cn: 我喜欢这辆概念车（原型车）。
